div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
حفظك اللّه وأبقاك
وجعلني فداك
كتبت إليك وأنا
وكل من قبلي بخير وعافية
واللّه محمود مشكور
قد كتب

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ḥafiẓa ka ăl lāhu wa ʾabqā ka
wa ǧaʿala nī fidāʾa ka
katabtu ʾilay ka wa ʾanā
wa kullu man qibal ī bi ḫayr:in wa ʿāfiyaẗ:in
wa ăl lāhu maḥmūd:un maškūr:un
qad kataba kutiba

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!
May God protect thee and preserve thee,
and may He make me thy ransom.
I have written to thee while I I write to thee...
and all those about me are in good state and health,
and God be praised and thanked for.
He has already written (it). It has been written.
